definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
see 烏骨雞|乌骨鸡[wu1 gu3 ji1]/black-boned chicken/silky fowl/silkie

sentences.english: Litsea cubeba is an important export essential oil resources plant in China.
sentences.chinese: 精油植物山雞椒是我國重要外銷精油資源植物。

sentences.english: It suggested that Zinc can improved the breeding egg performance in colored pheasants.
sentences.chinese: 表明添加鋅有利於提高七彩山雞的種蛋性能。

sentences.english: Theeagle hatched and thought he was a chicken.
sentences.chinese: 鷹被孵出來了，但他以爲自己是一隻山雞。

sentences.english: How to will not call that ringed pheasant grasped yesterday of.
sentences.chinese: 昨天抓的那隻山雞怎麼不會叫的。

sentences.english: Pheasants have demonstrated the importance of carotenoids to them.
sentences.chinese: 山雞顯示了對類胡蘿蔔素給他們。

definition: to act in a play/to put on a play
to die in such a way that sb (or sth) else also perishes/to take sb down with oneself/to end in mutual destruction
to rain curses (on sb)/to let sb have it/to bawl sb out
throwing weapon/dart/goods sent under the protection of an armed escort
living spirit, living image (idiom); true to life/vivid and realistic
